# size

**Instance Property**

The height and width of the region.

## Declaration

```swift
var size: AVCaptionSize { get }
```

## Discussion

CEA608 closed captions limit the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionSize/height] property’s value to 1 cell, except when the value of its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionRegion/scroll-swift.property] property is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionRegion/Scroll-swift.enum/rollUp]. In this case, the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionSize/height] property’s value must be 2, 3 or 4 cells.



## Accessing the size

- **AVCaptionSize**: A structure that defines the height and width of a caption.
